thread.title: He's the Cleveland guy behind those Crying Jordan jerseys cracking up the Internet
thread.title_full: He's the Cleveland guy behind those Crying Jordan jerseys cracking up the Internet

author: Joey Morona, cleveland.com
title: He's the Cleveland guy behind those Crying Jordan jerseys cracking up the Internet
text: A few days ago, Brian Havrilla, a 22-year-old MBA student from Willowick who also works in social media, sent the designs to ESPN business reporter Darren Rovell, who in turn, tweeted them out to his 1.73 million followers. When it comes to memes, Crying Jordan is a timeless classic, worthy of the Meme Hall of Fame if there was such a thing. It's versatile, succinct and never ceases to be funny.
